EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Quiz Taker that they've passed the module to continue to the next module
EmailTemplate.name: Quiz Pass Notification - NHNW
EmailTemplate.subject: NHNW Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Congratulations on passing the learning check for New Home, Now What. We hope that whether you have been a homeowner for one week or 10 years, you have learned something new.
We’ll email your certificate within 2 business days.
If you are looking for more ways to get involved with your community, check out our Community Development work and resources here: https://homewise.org/community-development/ < https://homewise.org/community-development/ >
If you are interested in a home improvement loan or seeing if a refinance is right for you, please visit https://homewise.org/refinance-your-home/ < https://homewise.org/refinance-your-home/ > or https://homewise.org/improve-your-home/ < https://homewise.org/improve-your-home/ >
If you are interested in selling your current home, we’d be honored to represent you. There are many benefits to listing your home with a salaried Homewise Realtor. Learn more by visiting https://homewise.org/sell-your-home/ < https://homewise.org/sell-your-home/ >
If you have additional questions, please reach out to us at trainers@homewise.org < mailto:trainers@homewise.org > or 505-983-9473
Best,
Your Homewise Training Team
